body.name: Purple Simply Seat Cushion, Pressure Reducing GelFlex Grid for Car Seats, Travel
body.description: The Purple Simply Seat Cushion Product Information A seat cushion engineered to the human comfort threshold, adjustable to any individual's body shape or weight. Ultra-soft, ultra-strong, solid rubber-like elastic material provides cradling relief. Double gel reversible design features a softer side for exceptional comfort, plus a firmer side for maximum support. The Purple Gel fill breathes, so it stays cool while in use. This durable elastic gel immediately returns to its original shape after use, with no permanent depressions. Adjusts to any individual's body shape or weight. Double gel reversible design. Stays cool while in use. Durable elastic gel consistency. Comes with a cover with carrying handles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BENEFITS: Great for use on hard chairs Perfect for soft chairs, couches and sofas. Excellent for use in cars. Fits most computer or office chairs. Ultra-soft, ultra-strong, solid rubber-like elastic material provides cradling relief. Double gel reversible design features a softer side for exceptional comfort, plus a firmer side for maximum support. The Purple Gel fill breathes, so it stays cool while in use. This durable elastic gel immediately returns to its original shape after use, with no permanent depressions. Adjusts to any individual's body shape or weight. Double gel reversible design. Stays cool while in use. Durable elastic gel consistency. Comes with a cover with carrying handles.

Sit comfy longer without your tailbone or wallet causing discomfort. The Purple Grid is engineered to relax under pressure while evenly supporting your body. You don’t have to sit sweaty with hundreds of open airways that keep the Purple Grid temperature-neutral, even after sitting for long periods of time. Your investment won’t bottom out. The Purple Grid is engineered with ultra-durable material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars feels firm but is soft enough to sit on an egg & not crack. supports m 225lb weight & no tailbone pain after long sitting period
reviews.reviewText: ok in short summary: feels firm but is soft enough to sit on an egg and not crack the egg surprisingly. 1.25" thick, supports my 225lb weight, after long sitting perioids in car and office playing games and doing i.t. work, i haven't had tailbone or coccyx strain/pain. and its not heat producing. hav sat in chairs or cushions that trap and generate heat after while.so more in depth thoughts and blabber:i love this cushion more than other cushions. most are foam. but its not hot it breathes. I tried sitting on an egg even tho this is 1.25" not the 2inch and the egg didn't crack. i did it slowly carefully but leaned back and raised my arms and legs to make sure my weight was on my buttocks and this thing is soft enough to conform to the pressure of an egg without cracking it. I'm 5' 6" / 7" and a bit hefty at 225lbs. so i'm not a light weight. granted the egg was in my butt crack which has a ... well crack or space to give, but i tried same thing with egg on a normal couch recliner chair with egg in a sandwhich baggy and that egg cracked and exploded.I slept on this as well just to see. i like firmer and fuller pillows , i'm a side sleeper , and threw this on top of a very thin pillow. its actually firm probably too firm for most people's heads my head didn't sink. this is very supportive of a lot of weight.I sat on this in my car and my office chair and i can tell i'm physically sitting higher like my knees almost hit bottom of my steering wheel in car and i definitely sit a lil higher. so this cushions and raises your body a good inch or so. but soft enough to site on an egg carefully without having issue.I would say its safe to assume if you're lighter in weight the 1" or thinner might support your body. i'm 225lbs and this 1 & quarter" thick supports my sitting weight fine.My office chair and sometimes in my car i get that Tailbone/Coccyx strain and pain. so this cushion , for me, is for providing long term sitting cushion and comfort and relive pressure and pain for me. i do I.T. work and sometimes work on my computer remotely all day, shop all day, and play games ... all in one day so this last week this thing has had a lot of use for one week.I did stretch this thing out and grabbing the ends and pulling apart, this thing stretches good. the material is like a firm jelly material. doesn't feel like typical anything really. but i've enjoyed it.i think this thing doesn't feel as soft as it is but it supports nicely and cushiony enough but feels a lil firm but so far haven't had that pain in my coccyx so i'm happy so far so good and its not hot. i live in houston its like 85-95 but feels like 95-105 with 200% humidity so i didn't want a cushion you feel as being hot and didn't want something that goes flat but can support me since i'm a bit over weight actually and i sit a lot. but no pain in the butt after long sitting period is a double!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its good, but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: I have a broken tailbone, and not much helps it. Saw this, thought I'd give it a try.First of all, there is a disclaimer about how it might be damaged if used while at a high temperature, which is where it would be if left in the car during a hot summer day. That was kinda my plan. I will say it hasn't been damaged, but its cooler now and hasn't been through more than a handful of hot days.Without the cushion I might last 1-2 hours before I have to just get out and walk around. I will say that although I didn't expect this to be perfect, I can go 2-4 hours on it before I need a break. It does work and provides comfort and support. Doesn't slide around in the seat when I get in and out as well.All in all, a good purchase. I'm betting most of you will have better comfort than I, but I'm doomed to not ever be 100% comfortable on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable but heavy and too large for a lot of chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for me
reviews.reviewText: I tried a different highly rated butt cushion first. It was thicker and probably better for those that need more support. However it wasn’t ideal me. It was so thick every time I sat down on it i’d jump up thinking I wasn’t sitting in my chair right.That’s what brought me here. I’ve purchased Purple products in the past and most worked out well. I took a chance on this. It’s just thick enough for what I need but no much I feel like I’m up on top of something. Plus this is a little wider too. Which I like. I use it on my office chair and work from home so it sees A LOT of use.The one issue I had was, even with the gripper bottom, it slides forward on the seat. But I connected a short bungee cord between the pillow handles around the back of my chair. Problem solved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Provides great extra cushion for an old computer chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally important if you have back pain
reviews.reviewText: Not only me who tried this in my car but two of my friends use the seat cushion and they didn't have any back pain as they used to sitting in the car driving specially that we drive a long distance every day.Just a note if you have a regular car the small size is enough because if you get the big size it might not be as comfy because the big size cushion are for trucks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to keep in place
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 of these, one for my computer chair and one for husband's. Can't adjust seating position because cushion scoots forward. Every time we get up from chairs the cushion hits the floor. Not all that comfortable either. Support, comfort, and relief from pain is better with dense foam cushion.
I am 300lb so most work chairs are not comfy over extended period of time but this helps me in that department and allows me to continue working without the discomfort
